altTitles.ja: ワンサイド特急~組織スマイル~

description.en:
Phantom spy action with Taka Saito who existed before the release of "Golgo 13"!
Recapture the submarine "Shrine" equipped with a threatening weapon!!< /span>

Explanation
Connecting between "007", "0011 Napoleon Solo" and "Golgo 13"
The missing link masterpiece "One Side" "Limited Express" is finally back in print!
Enjoy the flashy action and sophisticated story that makes you feel no sense of the passage of time over 40 years!Can this difficult case be solved!? First of all, we have to stay in the tiger's hole. A desperate undercover investigation begins. Mr. Arashi, the young leader of the One Side Express, has stepped up to take on this big deal that threatens the world if the media knows about it! It is said that Mr. Dodom, a genius scientist who defected from Republic M to Country S, was taken away by the mysterious organization ``Smile'' along with his submarine equipped with the latest weapons. A request came to them from country S! (Depending on the client, they may be called the Noraine or the cleaners of the world.)One Side Express, a detective bureau with bureaus all over the world - all of its members are former pirates, but they continue to work day and night for justice.

biography.en:
Saito Takao was born on November 3, 1936 in Wakayama, Japan. He died from pancreatic cancer on September 24, 2021.

He was a member of *Gekiga Koubou* (Gekiga Factory), along artists ("gekigaka", *gekiga* authors) such as Tsuge Yoshiharu, Hirata Hiroshi or Koike Kazuo among others.

**Associated names:**
さいとうたかを
SAITO Pro, SAITO Productions
さいとう・プロダクション
